data.what_is:
EngageBay is world's #1 affordable all-in-one marketing, sales, and support CRM software supporting over 29500 growing companies around the world. 

EngageBay helps companies to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers and grow their business 5x and more. 

EngageBay offers a slew of features including:
- Simple and powerful All-in-One CRM
- Easy to use marketing automation software
- Email marketing
- Free Live Chat Software
- Powerful helpdesk software
- Email Sequences
- Landing Pages
- Web Forms to capture online leads
- 360 Degree Customer View across marketing, sales and support departments
- Appointment Scheduling Software
- Contact Management Software
- Free CRM software
and many more.
data.product_description: Simple All-in-One Marketing Software. With awesome software tools backed by a dedicated support team to make every part of your marketing more effective.- World's #1 affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and support CRM- A completely integrated solution that eliminates the need for buying and using multiple business tools- Simple to use with low learning curve- Many features are free of cost- Buy the whole suite or individual features you need- No annual contracts- Proactive and friendly support at all times, even for free users- No onboarding fees charged- Free and seamless migration from other tools

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 55 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 54 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 64 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 47 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 42 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Document & Content Mgmt.
features.content: Based on 47 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 62 EngageBay All-in-One Suite reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very effective, useful and robust CRM
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I like the ability to create email sequences that sends the emails automatically based on the delay defined. Also it has the ability to import 25000 contacts at once which is a great feature. It offers various integrations like email validations using Zero bounce, sync with Hubspot, Zoom Meetings, Twilio, Ringcentral which makes life easier.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Although  it offers the features of email sequences it lacks the ability to change the order of emails in the sequence. One needs to delete the emails and create it again. It would be great if they can add the ability to change the order of emails in the sequence.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
EngageBay helps me to create a series of emails to followup with my clients using sequences and also has the ability to check for email opens and clicks and to skip the next set of emails based on opens or clicks.

2. It is easy to learn and implement throughout the organization.
3. We can easily add the no of users according to our requirements.
4. Can be integrated with other required tools such as email, data finder tools etc.

3. Our team can work collaboratively and assign tasks to the responsible person meanwhile keeping a track that which task is due from who's end.
4. It is so easy to use that our team started working on the platform by just a basic training using Engagebay's resource videos.

initial_reviews.review_title: The greatest CRM ever
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
When I started working for my current firm two years ago, I made use of Engage Bay for the first time. In the past, I used HubSpot and Salesforce. I had anticipated that switching to Engage Bay would be difficult, but it was actually rather simple. The platform is incredibly user-friendly, feature-rich, and intuitive. The best part about Engage Bay, in my opinion, is how simple it is to use. You will adore Engage Bay whether you are a seasoned user from another platform or a first-time user. The Support staff is equally amazing. Over the past five years, I've asked Charles a few inquiries, and he's always responded very quickly.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I have two things that I don't like. 1) You are unable to copy and paste a screen grab into the Support chat! That irritates me a lot because it is pretty fundamental functionality and would greatly simplify my life. 2) No threading of emails! I would like to be able to thread previous emails in a sequence when sending them out, since this can increase open rates and provide context for the subsequent follow-up email. The fact that every email is brand-new and has no past data bothers me!

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The capacity of EngageBay All-in-One Suite to combine multiple features into a single platform is its greatest feature.

The best part about Engage Bay, in my opinion, is how simple it is to use. You will adore Engage Bay whether you are a seasoned user from another platform or a first-time user. initial_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive and Cost-Effective CRM Solution
initial_reviews.review_content:

The best part about EngageBay All-in-One Suite is its ability to consolidate numerous functions into a single platform. The suite efficiently combines marketing automation, sales CRM, and customer support tools, reducing the need for multiple software and streamlining our operations significantly.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I find the reporting features a bit limited compared to other CRM solutions. While it covers all the basics, advanced data analysis requires some workarounds, which can be a bit cumbersome at times.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
EngageBay All-in-One Suite has streamlined our marketing, sales, and customer support operations by providing a unified platform for all these activities. This integration has led to better alignment of strategies, improved lead management, and a more personalized approach to customer interactions. As a result, we're seeing higher conversion rates and increased customer satisfaction.

initial_reviews.review_title: Quick set up and implementation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
EngageBay was easy to implement and start using right away. Our need was for a tool that would serve as a CRM to track activities and follow ups and as an email marketing tool to set up and send email sequences and campaigns.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
We experienced a few minor glitches during the initial set up of contacts and email sequences. After entering several hundred contacts, we discovered none them had a company name associated with them. There turned out to be a need to add the company name to the platforms database when you entered the first person of that company that their support team shared with us.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
EngageBay has provided us with a way to quickly scale up the number of prospects that we can reach out to and educate them on the services Data Migration Experts provide each month. We are able to review reports after an email sequence has gone out and analyze who has opened the email and clicked on links or attachments that we have sent. This allows us to segment the people who are responsive and tailor further targeted messaging to.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Interaction Tracking and Very Responsive Technical Support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I like the functionality that allows me to see if my prospects have read my correspondence. The "Deals" functionality is also excellent and keeps things together very nicely.
I am a fan of the task functionality too. I can create follow-up tasks at certain times right from my customer interactions.
Customer support is very responsive to questions about how to use the software, and the in-software chat feature makes it less intrusive to my workflow.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
With the tasks, I wish I was able to integrate them with other task list managers I use like Google Tasks or Todoist. I can only do this with a Business Google account which we do not currently use as a company, but I do as an individual.

The ticketing system is very limited in its interactions with other places in the software, for example, I cannot attach tickets to Deals. I also cannot comment on tickets moved to other departments which can be a block of communication and closing loops.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?

The ease of use I would say is the best thing about Engage Bay. If you are a first-time user or a seasoned user from other platforms, you will LOVE Engage Bay. The Support team are also Phenomenal. I have asked a few questions over the past few years and Charles always get back to me supper quick, askes more questions to clarify what I am needing and provides the answers. He Defiantly knows this product!

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
There are two things I dislike.
1) in the Support chat you can't take a screen shot and paste it into the chat! I find that very annoying as it is very basic functionality and would make life a lot easier.
2) No Email threading! When sending out sequences, I would like to be able to thread the emails that have been sent prior, it gives context to the next follow up email and can improve open rates. I don't like that each email is new with no history on it!

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
All marketing and Sales Activity in one place. We use to have separate systems,

initial_reviews.review_title: I Chose Engagebay over Hubspot
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
All-in-one. EngageBay combines marketing, sales, and customer service tools in a single platform, which can simplify managing those aspects of your business.

Affordability. EngageBay is a budget-friendly alternative to HubSpot with pretty much all the same features
.
Customer views. You can see all your interactions with a customer in one place. This can help personalize marketing and support efforts.

Super easy implementation and their support is quick and knowledgeable.

Lots of features you wouldn't expect for the price.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
It does have a bit of a learning curve but they all do when there are so many features.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a small - medium company it's difficult to manage multiple software to market to our customers effectively. Having everything connected in one place makes all the difference!

Before, keeping customer data current between all different software was difficult and led to errors. Now we have it all in one place, well organized and easy to find/edit.

We could not afford to pay for some of the other crm's out there, this really makes it affodable to produce professional results.

all_reviews.review_title: The greatest CRM ever
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
When I started working for my current firm two years ago, I made use of Engage Bay for the first time. In the past, I used HubSpot and Salesforce. I had anticipated that switching to Engage Bay would be difficult, but it was actually rather simple. The platform is incredibly user-friendly, feature-rich, and intuitive. The best part about Engage Bay, in my opinion, is how simple it is to use. You will adore Engage Bay whether you are a seasoned user from another platform or a first-time user. The Support staff is equally amazing. Over the past five years, I've asked Charles a few inquiries, and he's always responded very quickly.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I have two things that I don't like. 1) You are unable to copy and paste a screen grab into the Support chat! That irritates me a lot because it is pretty fundamental functionality and would greatly simplify my life. 2) No threading of emails! I would like to be able to thread previous emails in a sequence when sending them out, since this can increase open rates and provide context for the subsequent follow-up email. The fact that every email is brand-new and has no past data bothers me!

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The capacity of EngageBay All-in-One Suite to combine multiple features into a single platform is its greatest feature.

I had anticipated that switching to Engage Bay would be difficult, but it was actually rather simple. The platform is incredibly user-friendly, feature-rich, and intuitive. The best part about Engage Bay, in my opinion, is how simple it is to use. You will adore Engage Bay whether you are a seasoned user from another platform or a first-time user. The Support staff is equally amazing. Over the past five years, I've asked Charles a few inquiries, and he's always responded very quickly.

EngageBay was easy to implement and start using right away. Our need was for a tool that would serve as a CRM to track activities and follow ups and as an email marketing tool to set up and send email sequences and campaigns.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
We experienced a few minor glitches during the initial set up of contacts and email sequences. After entering several hundred contacts, we discovered none them had a company name associated with them. There turned out to be a need to add the company name to the platforms database when you entered the first person of that company that their support team shared with us.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
EngageBay has provided us with a way to quickly scale up the number of prospects that we can reach out to and educate them on the services Data Migration Experts provide each month. This allows us to segment the people who are responsive and tailor further targeted messaging to.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Interaction Tracking and Very Responsive Technical Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I like the functionality that allows me to see if my prospects have read my correspondence. The "Deals" functionality is also excellent and keeps things together very nicely.
I am a fan of the task functionality too. I can create follow-up tasks at certain times right from my customer interactions.
Customer support is very responsive to questions about how to use the software, and the in-software chat feature makes it less intrusive to my workflow.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
With the tasks, I wish I was able to integrate them with other task list managers I use like Google Tasks or Todoist. I can only do this with a Business Google account which we do not currently use as a company, but I do as an individual.

The ticketing system is very limited in its interactions with other places in the software, for example, I cannot attach tickets to Deals. I also cannot comment on tickets moved to other departments which can be a block of communication and closing loops.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am not connected enough on the administrative level to know how to answer this question.

Affordability. EngageBay is a budget-friendly alternative to HubSpot with pretty much all the same features
.

Super easy implementation and their support is quick and knowledgeable.

Lots of features you wouldn't expect for the price.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a small - medium company it's difficult to manage multiple software to market to our customers effectively. Having everything connected in one place makes all the difference!

Before, keeping customer data current between all different software was difficult and led to errors. Now we have it all in one place, well organized and easy to find/edit.

We could not afford to pay for some of the other crm's out there, this really makes it affodable to produce professional results.

all_reviews.review_title: Streamlined exactly what we needed and got rid of useless functionality
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
We are a start up - and before we began our outreach and paid advertising campaigns  we wanted all of the automation and email sequencing in place before we clicked 'play'. I trialled Pipedrive and other CRMs and althought most offered this funtionality - they were overly complicated and the automations side seemed like a bolt-on to what would have been simply a customer management software - rather than a Marketing Machine (which is what we needed).

So far Engagebay has helped us streamline out sales campaigns and the support team have been extremely helpful to get everything set up through onboarding and even before we subcribed.

Would recommend.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The Engagebay calendar widget and appointments functions needs better integration allowances but I have been told they are working on this within their current roadmap of improvements (to add hidden fields for example to track where the contacts who are scheduling an appointment are coming from as a lead source). There are workaround, but we are looking forward to the improvements.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automating the whole marketing process.

Each module has a myriad number of features that you can implement in your own way that will meet your company's needs.

all_reviews.review_title: Engage Bay All-in-One Suite: A Comprehensive Tool for Managing Sales and Customer Interactions
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
It is a helpful tool for small and medium-sized businesses, providing a range of automation and workflow features for sales, marketing, and support. The platform is easy to use and offers good customer service, including the ability to quickly implement new features upon request. Its all-in-one solution and affordable price point make it a good choice for startups and small businesses.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I wish there was more space for lists without having to upgrade the plan. These lists are really useful for keeping my business organized, and I think it would be great if the paid plans included more of them. I've also been contacted a lot by sales, which is fine, but the policy of deactivating accounts if they're not logged into at least once a week is a bit shocking. I understand the need for some level of activity, but I think once a quarter or even once a month would be more reasonable, especially for those of us running a side business and not needing to be on the platform every week.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform's range of features, including lead and contact management, sales forecasting, email, and messaging tools, and integrations with other business applications, it helps streamline our sales process and improve our ability to connect with and serve our customers. The automation and workflow features of Engage Bay helps us save time and resources by automating tasks and streamlining our processes. Overall, the All-in-One Suite has improved our efficiency and effectiveness as a digital marketing agency, allowing us to better serve our clients and grow our business.

review_question_answers.answer: It is a helpful tool for small and medium-sized businesses, providing a range of automation and workflow features for sales, marketing, and support. The platform is easy to use and offers good customer service, including the ability to quickly implement new features upon request. Its all-in-one solution and affordable price point make it a good choice for startups and small businesses.

I understand the need for some level of activity, but I think once a quarter or even once a month would be more reasonable, especially for those of us running a side business and not needing to be on the platform every week.

review_question_answers.answer: The platform's range of features, including lead and contact management, sales forecasting, email, and messaging tools, and integrations with other business applications, it helps streamline our sales process and improve our ability to connect with and serve our customers. all_reviews.review_title: Great platform for Small to Medium sized business. Great customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
- Affordable
- Easy to use
- Great customer support
- As a Manufacturing company, I find their Task dashboard is very helpful as I can choose Grid view instead of List, so we've made it into a project tracker

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
- No email sync unless you get Sales Pro or All-in-One plan.
- Some features need improvement such as the filter. For example, suppose I want to filter contacts of multiple accounts (let's say 5). In that case, I have to create the same set of conditions for 5 accounts instead of being able to pick multiple accounts from a list, and there is no way I can duplicate the set I create, which is time-consuming. You'll encounter many other little things along the way and have to work around them.
- They have the mobile app but I haven't been able to use it. If I go to "Deals" and want to click on a deal to see more details, nothing happens. Please fix your mobile app.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
A great platform for both our Sales and Marketing teams, a great alternative to Hubspot as we're a small company and need something simple and more affordable. We can also work with other departments in the company using the Tasks feature.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
review_question_answers.answer:
- Affordable
- Easy to use
- Great customer support
- As a Manufacturing company, I find their Task dashboard is very helpful as I can choose Grid view instead of List, so we've made it into a project tracker

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
review_question_answers.answer:
- No email sync unless you get Sales Pro or All-in-One plan.
- Some features need improvement such as the filter. For example, suppose I want to filter contacts of multiple accounts (let's say 5). In that case, I have to create the same set of conditions for 5 accounts instead of being able to pick multiple accounts from a list, and there is no way I can duplicate the set I create, which is time-consuming. You'll encounter many other little things along the way and have to work around them.
- They have the mobile app but I haven't been able to use it. If I go to "Deals" and want to click on a deal to see more details, nothing happens. Please fix your mobile app.

review_question_answers.answer: A great platform for both our Sales and Marketing teams, a great alternative to Hubspot as we're a small company and need something simple and more affordable. We can also work with other departments in the company using the Tasks feature.

all_reviews.review_title: Really powerful and affordable
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
A holistic solution for small and medium-sized companies. An optimal choice for StartUps. Nearby everything covered what a business needs to get going. If you even don't have a website, you can set it up as a 100% fully automated marketing machine with graphical and logical pathways.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Some setup steps can be a bit difficult, and some essential functionalities on mobile devices are missing. I know most functions are not necessary on mobiles, but responding to contact emails or copying phone numbers to start calls can get annoying, even with their explicit app. But I'm sure that will be improved in the near future (if not done already).

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
EngageBay allows you to get potential clients and helps you to bind your existing ones. It allows you to track all your communications and interactions with your client. From web forms to proposals and project progress, tracking clicks and start automating if conditions are met supports you on the pathway to an successful lead. From forms, online chats, custom fields, even phone calls from within the app, voice recordings, tracking, tagging and much more: For this price-performance ratio, you hardly find competitors (and I searched a lot!).

all_reviews.review_title: Engagebay works well for our purposes since it works with our Thinkific LMS websites.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
It's most helpful that Engagebay can automatically sync course enrollments from our Thinkific LMS websites. That way, we can segment contacts by what they've shown interest in. The automations and workflows are particularly helpful for moving leads through different lessons to vet interested leads before assigning them to the sales department. It's a plus that we don't have to recreate our website on their platform to make it work for us.  Also, the team at Engagebay is very responsive to our needs.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
There are a few things that could be made easier in the programming, like copying whole automations to workflows so we don't have to manually recreate them and copying of emails created in automations--it would be nice if templates were automatically created when an email is created anywhere. Looking up a contact's activity from live chat could be more seamless because a contact doesn't wait around very long to get an answer; instead of having to open another tab, I'd like to be able to click on the email to open the Contact's record.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeted followup emails that are automated based on what a contact does on our website is probably the biggest problem that we are going to be able to solve. Assigning salespeople automatically at the end of that followup evenly between our sales department is also a game changer for us.

all_reviews.review_title: A Great CRM Better Than HubSpot, Salesforce, And Many Others!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The EngageBay All-in-one platform is the most simple, but what I like best they have great customer support. This I would say is that USP (Unique Selling Proposition). However, there are many things I love about the platform. It has a Marketing, Sales, and Support system for your business. The marketing platform allows you to build landing pages and create automation to take your prospect through the customer journey, where they come out on the backside as paying customers. The sales platform is designed for direct sales (Telemarketing).

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
There are many things I dislike, but the simplicity of the platform allows for quite a few workarounds. As you have probably learned, there is no perfect platform. All of them have issues. Here are my gripes about EngageBay. They don't have enough video training. If you're not somewhat intuitive, this is not the platform for you. However, the intuitive thrives here; it is just that simple.

I don't like the mobile landing page builder. You build the desktop, and then you must rebuild the mobile landing pages. I don't like their third-party integrations. They are sometimes not as intuitive. I don't like the way the sticky-bars work; they should allow you to suspend them without deleting them as you deem necessary.

I a sure there are other things, but nothing significant. In the end, it is just tiny frustrations, and there are no large ones.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
They allow me to do almost all of my marketing from one platform. I have a landing page builder, forms, stick-bars to build a list, and social media post disbursements. There have been many products I have been able to replace my autoresponder, my website platform, automation,  and many other tools they allow you to get rid of. At the end of they day I would imagine they save you $500+ per month.

all_reviews.review_title: EngageBay is reliable, has everything you would need for a small business & good customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The customer service is pretty great. They have all of the automations and workflows you need for a small business. It's a great platform for an all-in-one sales, marketing, and support tool, and it's a pretty good option considering the price point. It's not too complex to use once you get into the swing of things. They even implemented a feature in two days in the forms that I thought would be useful and easy to execute after talking to support about it once.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The only issues I've run into with EngageBay is there aren't any ETAs or timelines for things that are on the roadmap or in development. Other than that, everything has been good.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Truly having an all-in-one solution to a small business. Being able to manage all my contacts, leads, correspondence, marketing campaigns and automations in one place has been great for keeping myself and my business organized.

It's a flexible, intuitive, and easy-to-use solution for marketing and sales. Especially the automation functions are excellent. I'm also very impressed with the customer service. Market and sales automation (e-mail, sequences etc.), web forms, pop-ups, live chat, task management, appointment scheduling software and 360-degree customer view are popular functions for us. It helps us build stronger relationships with our customers and free up time with automated processes.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Value for a Comprehensive Marketing Suite
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
EngageBay offers comparable functionality to ActiveCampaign for a fraction of the price. The interface is straightforward and easy to use, which made the transition relatively painless. Plus, whenever we've encountered issues, the technical support team has been incredibly responsive. They often resolve the issue during the chat; if not, they typically provide a solution within one or two business days--even when the solution requires coding.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The system feels somewhat young (although it's growing up quickly!). For instance, the supposedly responsive, mobile-friendly templates really weren't. Still, once we brought this to the team's attention, they fixed the issue, and the new, responsive templates populated throughout the system. Overall, the templates seem clunky and not as sophisticated to use as, say, Mailchimp, but the platform is far more robust. Also, the navigation can be challenging. I always struggle with locating the email autoresponders, which are embedded in a specific workflow and not editable elsewhere.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using EngageBay to track conversions for website landing pages and to send automated emails for site visitors who take specific actions. We also use it to send out email campaigns segmented for different audiences.

all_reviews.review_title: They actually treat me like they want my business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
There are so many features that I didn't even know I would want / need and then right about the time I realize I need / want it, I find already part of the solution.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I'm finding the self-serve documentation to be a little thin. There is a plethora of video tutorials etc that get you up and running but the more detailed stuff doesn't seem to have documentation depth. Perhaps it is because they want to assist with things beyond the usual.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
I have been in the corporate world for 30+ years and have been part of very large software contracts and purchases. In my experience, it is common for vendors to tell me how important my business is to them. Engagebay treats me like my business matters to them, even though I am a very small start-up.  Not sure there is a better solution out there. Almost certain it would cost significantly more if there is. Engagebay seems to be practicing good old fashion business. Treat the little guy like he is your most important customer, one day he might be and he might not be so little.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing, Marketing funnels, sales funnels, opt-in funnels, funnels, funnels, funnels, landing pages, opt-in forms, customer relationship management, end to end integrations from lead magnet fulfillment to sales lead to actual sales (physical and digital) to shipping and fulfillment and customer support. I'm sure I'm leaving something out.

all_reviews.review_title: After Evaluating 32 CRMs, I Chose Engage Bay
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
It''s funnel builder is one of the best and I have used Kartra and Clickfunnels. I love the Kanban Task view. Their support is phenomenal. They fixed 3 of my problems within a couple of days. They also answer functionality questions and stayed on a chat with me for about an hour until I had my personal domain fully configured. I love the Chrome plugin that allows me to add contacts at the click of a button in Linkedin and Gmail. I also love the "Activity" and "Source" information kept with each contact. I love the Calendar/Appointment feature with the Zoom integration. It allowed me to replace Calendly and provides better tracking.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The conversational mailbox is missing a few things. For example, if I want to reply to a message I already sent to a contact as a follow-up, I have to copy their email address and paste it in the "To" field. Other CRMs would auto-fill it just by me typing the contact name in the "To" field or it would pre-populate it with the Contacts default email Id. Also, any contacts added by the Chrome plugin do not trigger an event so you cannot launch an automation from these contacts. Have to manually start it.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
If you are looking for a complete CRM Marketing and Sales solution that is fully integrated then Engage Bay is the tool for you.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Freed up a lot of my time where I was managing the day-to-day admin activities so I can spend more time on calls and zoom calls with potential customers.

* Lead generation funnel (replaced Kartra which had replaced Clickfunnels). Now everything is integrated.
* Contact management and follow-ups (Replaced Hubspot)
* Lead nurturing with drip email campaigns (Replaced Mailchimp or any autoresponder)
* Marketing automation (Replaced Mailgun)
* Appointment scheduling and tracking (Replaced Calendly)

There are more benefits/features I plan on taking advantage of. I just haven't gotten to them all yet (e.g SMS and Call integrations)

all_reviews.review_title: 'Super-fast' learning curve thanks to 'super-patient' online chat support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The support team on online chat, is a standout feature of this mob. The software is intuitive enough to jump straight in and start creating with no training, simply because the online chat team is there to answer any and all questions about how to do the simplest, to the more demanding tasks.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
This is very difficult to answer. I have not found anything to dislike yet....maybe it could be better if it provided a built-in e-signature facility. At the moment this facility is provided by third-party supplier, Docu-sign.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
It took me a weekend to write about 12 automated procedures that practically run my entire business without assistance. The online chat team are awesome in their knowledge, their promptness of response, their PATIENCE and sometimes on lucky days, their sense of humour. They usually respond with minimal wait times at any time of the day, night or week (including Sundays).

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
My business requires careful tracking of both companies and individuals along a marketing journey of about a dozen steps, including three reminders. Each stage of the journey is driven by a different client action. Some, but not all stages, can be automated. The rest demand judicious use of tags, calendar events and notes, for each client, which in EngageBay, are very simple to fill in and retrieve. Also easy to automate and read, is the sales journey that occurs after the marketing journey.

all_reviews.review_title: Tool Empowering my marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I first saw EngageBay August of 2018. Its a big fuzz during the black friday sale on that year as well. I think it was promising but it does not meet my need yet. I signed up for the free account and just check it from time to time. I am amazed of the progress they have for a short time.  Finally, I checked it again during the first quarter of 2020. Times are tough, Im just thankful Engagebay is sophisticated enough to handle my marketing. I slowly migrated. After a few months, Im doing pretty well. Just glad I switched over. I have a system with a really high standard for a price far lower than what I use to pay.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I explore EngageBay functions thoroughly to maximize its use. I noticed for the entirety of my use of Engagebay that new features seem to come out faster than related documentations. In some cases, I do not find any documentation at all. Engagebay is easy to use so I can figure how to work things out eventually. however, it is nice to have immediate guide so that I can make use of the new features right on. In addition, It is also nice to have a place where I can see new features released. I can only find out of these new features when I accidentally come across it or when I ask support.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
If you need a complete tool where you can do your business then I say EngageBay is the way to go. It improves almost every week and it is very affordable.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been a freelance Web Developer and Digital Marketing Analyst for the past 6 years and I am constantly working on growing my market. I am used to professional level tools that I have in my corporate job. However, they prove to be costly. Discovering EngageBay, allows me to operate on that level of professional environment I want and organize my efforts in my marketing and doing transactions with my clients with a really affordable pricetag.

all_reviews.review_title: OUTSTANDING!!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I am blown away by the overall ease of use, the suite of features, and customer service! I spent 2 full days researching all the CRM's out there, and this one did all I needed and SO much more for the least amount of money. Perfect for the Solopreneur!

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Honestly, nothing. It does require a learning curve, but that would be the same for any CRM when setting it up, but the support has made even that less of a chore for me.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
Don't waste a lot of time looking around; pick 2 or 3 others to compare and call it a day, this is the best CRM I've used, and I've had HubSpot, SalesForce, and Zoho.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The automation and workflows combined with the contact management are a godsend. I also used the templates more than I thought I would.

all_reviews.review_title: Exceptionally good all-in-one tool, does 99% of what I want it to do
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The fact that I can run multiple businesses, on multiple domains, from one tool. This was critical to me and I love this feature. I also love the calendar synchronisation, the appointments feature (no need for Calendly) and the deal tracks (yes, tracks, plural - you can run multiple deal pipelines, each for different businesses if you want). Support is also very responsive and the package is great value for money.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
So far, nothing particularly leaps out - it is, like many such tools, only as good as the info you can gather and the info you enter, as well as how well you use features. The email marketing feature, for example, seems brilliant, but I haven't even begun to use it yet. This is on me, not Engagebay. All in all, I am happy I signed up.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
Consider whether you need - or will need in future - all of the features. Make sure to use the trial and get the demo, it is very helpful.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Running more than one business under the same software, without having to pay extra. This, for me, was critical.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Unknown Marketing Automation Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Comprehensive suite of applications combining crm, marketing, and service applications under one umbrella. Well designed and easy to navigate between the 3 applications. A lot pf power under the hood too for the more advanced marketers. It's logical next step after the basic Mailchimp products where they just added functionality over time and then you had a big mess! To get started, it is as easy as it gets!

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I'd like to see more visual dashboards come into play. The ones now out of the box are good, but maybe the idea to build your own view and have more flexibility as to how you see the data would be cool. And I never was able to get SMS working, so a more complete solution for text marketing would be nice to see.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
3 tools replaced by one. Saved money too. Forms on social media and websites. Basic use now for email broadcasts, but will be setting up automations and email sequences for my new business to educate new users.

all_reviews.review_title: Realtor in search of a new CRM, using EngageBay
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
EngageBay gives me the flexibility to automate my processes and "take the work out", whether it's for Marketing, Sales, or Operations. I can trigger a call, SMS, or email based on a customer response, or lack thereof.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Lack of a Manual. Video and blog posts are fine but time-consuming. I want step by step documentation - in writing. This is not just an EngageBay limitation, but industry-wide. I also have a Pixel 3XL on Google Fi's network that could use a little "poetry" as well. EB is not hard to learn or use, but a bit of a mystery on some of the advanced features.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
There's a lot you can do here, I'm still creating. Even though I'm a "corporation" of one today -  a Sales, Marketing and Ticketing System will allow me to hire people for those functions in the future.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Communications and follow up. As a Realtor, I need to communicate with young and old via text, email, social media, phone, in-person, and who knows -  drones in the future. In addition, if you've been in sales longer than 10 min, you can't rely on the customer to "call you".  Therefore, being able to automatically task yourself/team for follow up, or create a ticket is extremely valuable.

all_reviews.review_title: Engagebay wins over Hubspot
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The Engagebay All-in-One suite offers exactly what is says; All-in-One Marketing, Sales & CRM with automation and workflow capabilities. This means it is a very efficient and scalable platform for SME's as they grow their business.

The combination of automation and workflow means that SME's can perform as effectively as Large organisation without the burden of dedicated resources required to integrate component capabilities across multiple platforms.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Still early in the implementation but any questions or issues on how to have quickly been answered by the support team via the chat.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a relatively new entity, we have explored lots of 'free' products but they tend to offer limited or specific capabilities i.e a CRM or a Marketing platform, which means we spend a lot of time trying to integrate disparate solutions in to one. We also spend a lot of time building automations across these systems, only to find that you have to upgrade each disparate system to enable the functionality.

Engagebay is enabling us to centralise our efforts from Marketing, Sales, and Post-sales support out of the box, saving us Time and money of managing disparate subscriptions, upgrades and integrations.

all_reviews.review_title: EngageBay - Responsive, Helpful, and cost effective CRM solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Their support is fantastic,  they have a cost effective solution packed with features.  Their engineering team is quick to fix issues we spot (and we don't spot very many).  They have great integration with MailGun and Zapier. It's super simple to navigate the interface, speak with customers, segregate the contacts lists, apply tags, and basically manage the environment.  Love managing Deals within the platform, and marketing emails are a breeze to setup and send out.

Every time I interact with our success representative, he is friendly, and the team has a strong desire to make things work for us.  They've already gone out of their way to add a few key features that moved their entire platform forward.  All I have to say is: BRAVO, well done!

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Some of the pop-up windows can be hard to scroll through sometimes.  I would appreciate it more if they worked a bit on their usability of the UI, and the layout of their components.  I also think they should increase some of the triggers available in Zapier, so it would be easier to create deals, and companies through the zapier integration.

Would love to see a few more enhancements, these are not dislikes - just enhancements.
1) Wish it would integrate to MelissaData for validation, cleansing, and fixing of names, emails, addresses
2) Wish it had more triggers in Zapier so we can automatically create / manage deals, companies, and help desk tickets
3) Wish it would host the web-pages (it has a good web page builder, just doesn't allow us to host the webpages in a finished site or a white-listed URL)
4) Wish they would add custom reports & metrics / charts & graphs that we could choose the metrics for, things like grouping by tags that "start with X" or "contain Y", counts, summaries, etc..   reports about deals and amounts, reports about deadlines and timelines.
5) Wish they had a facility to: Create a Watermarked PDF (with each contact name), then send that PDF to that specific contact.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
If you want a solid CRM at a decent price, that does what it says it will do, then EngageBay is definitely worth a look.  It does take a bit of getting used to (usability wise), but it's a fantastic platform.   If you need all kinds of bells and whistles, or serious customization, then perhaps, moving on to a high cost platform like HubSpot or Salesforce is the way to go.    I really like EngageBay, and will continue with the platform in to the future.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed a mostly full featured CRM (contacts, segmentation, email blasts, tracking, tagging, deals, companies) without all the hassle of steep learning curves, and without all the configuration that some of the "more well known" CRM's have.  We also needed something within our budget that simply worked, gave us an API, and Zapier connections.  EngageBay is helping us grow our business and manage our contacts and our relationships with those contacts.  Really streamlining our business.

3) Wish it would host the web-pages (it has a good web page builder, just doesn't allow us to host the webpages in a finished site or a white-listed URL)
4) Wish they would add custom reports & metrics / charts & graphs that we could choose the metrics for, things like grouping by tags that "start with X" or "contain Y", counts, summaries, etc..   reports about deals and amounts, reports about deadlines and timelines.
5) Wish they had a facility to: Create a Watermarked PDF (with each contact name), then send that PDF to that specific contact.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
review_question_answers.answer: If you want a solid CRM at a decent price, that does what it says it will do, then EngageBay is definitely worth a look.  It does take a bit of getting used to (usability wise), but it's a fantastic platform.   If you need all kinds of bells and whistles, or serious customization, then perhaps, moving on to a high cost platform like HubSpot or Salesforce is the way to go.    I really like EngageBay, and will continue with the platform in to the future.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We needed a mostly full featured CRM (contacts, segmentation, email blasts, tracking, tagging, deals, companies) without all the hassle of steep learning curves, and without all the configuration that some of the "more well known" CRM's have.  We also needed something within our budget that simply worked, gave us an API, and Zapier connections.  EngageBay is helping us grow our business and manage our contacts and our relationships with those contacts.  Really streamlining our business.

all_reviews.review_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Full of features, easy to use, and a fraction of the cost of many others
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
LOVE that EngageBay if feature-rich. It still amazes me that it is a fraction of the cost of many others out there, but has so many more features and functionalities. Works across multiple departments' needs, easy to train clients on and use internally, integration is easy and simple to set up...heck entire system is easy to set up and start rockin 'n rollin.
It is the perfect system for clients looking for a full-featured platform that is easy to use, easy to get set up, and who want to save on costs of the big guys. I am telling you this system is customizable and will fit any small business needs!

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
It is hard to pick anything, but I would say more reporting options at an overall high-level not necessarily detailed per campaign/sequence...but that could already be in place and I am just not 100% sure where to locate that...it is so feature-rich I will be discovering everything it can do for years to come!

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
Do it! There is a learning curve like every system, but on-going maintenance of system and setup is simple, easy to teach clients how to use. It is great for a startups and micro-businesses looking to implement more marketing automation into their efforts and looking to grow with a system that can grow with them!

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Simple to use yet advanced in functionality; CRM and marketing platform. The benefits... every day I discover cool new things that it can do. We try to implement new functionality internally and test before we recommend it to clients as an option. We have helped clients save thousands of dollars (and lots of headaches) by recommending they switch to EngageBay from the other guys.

all_reviews.review_title: Great all in one platform at a reasonable (all inclusive) price.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
The all in one functionality that includes sales, marketing and service, but mostly I like that the platform has a pricing model that isn't continually an upsell. You don't run out of emails or contacts or something else and are asked to upgrade only to run out of something tomorrow that you have to upgrade to as well.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
For an all in one platform there isn't a lot to not like. Like any tech system there are quirks here and there and some functionalities are not super intuitive so you have to learn what these are and work through them. Their live chat icon often gets in the way of things :(

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
I have used many of the other platforms (from Clickfunnels, and Hubspot through to Salesforce) and have not regretted going with EngageBay.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Predominantly we are using the platform for sales funnel creation with landing pages and forms to generate users from ad campaigns and then re-target those contacts we generate through engagement whether through email or other means.

all_reviews.review_title: Very good CRM, but a bit rough around the edges
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Very cost-effective for the services provided. There is a complete suite which can prove daunting at first, but contains everything you'd need in quite neat modules, all linked into the main CRM.

The help desk is also very accessible and quick to resolve issues. I had to contact them on Day 1 to resolve some set up issues and they were great.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Not so easy to navigate and complete tasks as other CRMs. It took a bit of time learning my way around the screens and also what functionality does what - some is quite hidden away at first glance.  My main dislike is that the task list doesn't have simple "tick box" to mark a task as completed. In addition the list can't be sorted for due dates.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
I need to dig into the system in more detail, however the landing pages and sequences will improve my business dramatically.

I primarily use this to log emails (the tracking isnt working for me with Outlook (needs to be outlook365), and task management.

all_reviews.review_title: EngageBay Marketing system Rocks!!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I like the advanced customizability of the emailing system. Something I expect in Hubspot and Dynamics 365. I am both surprised and happy to see it in EngageBay. The other features are also standard in top brands. One other thing I really like is the social suite. I am empowered to manage and even schedule my posts using EngageBay.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Everything is good. However, it will be nice to be able to have linkedIn Streams in the system. I can automatically post with 4 of my most important platforms, FaceBook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn. Business wise it will be a great addition if I can see LinkedIn feed in EngageBay too, so that I don't have too many windows open for monitoring.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been using a complete system when my business started to grow. However, the cost seems to get heavier in time. I totally get that the system is complex and it gets the job done. But it is getting a big chunk from my budget. Discovering EngageBay gave me what I need to continue my business without hurting my budget. It has a lot of room for improvement, but it is enough to get my business going and more.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Vice President of Sales and Implementation

all_reviews.review_title: Beyond My Expectations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
There are many areas I like about EngageBay. I've spent a considerable amount of time with its features on forms, e-mail marketing, automation, CRM, and landing pages. I think the product does it all pretty well, in an easy-to-use way.

The best-implemented feature I see is the landing pages. It's super easy to build drag-and-drop landing pages and works on both mobile and desktop browsers. Not very customizable, but very user-friendly. In addition to the landing pages, I enjoyed using the automation feature. It's pretty intuitive.

Within the two weeks I used it, I faced with some bugs and reported them to the support. The support team is very responsive, and they fix bugs in a fast way.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
Well, the user experience can be better. I'm not sure if it's right to compare EngageBay with HubSpot, but compared with HubSpot, there is a way to go for EngageBay in the experience area. In terms of features, I think the product is quite strong. One thing is that even though it helps you do everything in an easy way, there can be some flexibility on customizations for more professional marketers, or people with a technical background.

Another and the most major one for me is the branded e-mails. Even though you have a monthly subscription, you still need to buy e-mail credits to send unbranded e-mails. It's still inexpensive compared with relevant products within the field, but it doesn't make sense from my point of view. I would increase the prices but wouldn't charge my customers for having unbranded e-mails.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
When you have questions about the product's functions at marketing automation, e-mail marketing or CRM features, be sure to talk with the support, and play with the UI. Not all areas of the product are intuitive; hence, check the UI elements to not miss anything.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
EngageBay currently covers my landing page, automation, form, e-mail marketing needs as a single platform. It's been around two weeks now, and everything works seamlessly. I've implemented landing pages, migrated all my forms within my websites to EngageBay, and can keep track of my customers' or prospects' activity across my digital channels.

all_reviews.review_title: A tool on the go
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I am always on the move and ideas often pop-up in most unlikely of places. I really like the fact that this tool is so lite that I can easily use it even when I have very basic or even slow Internet speed.  I even use my landing pages not merely to promote my blog but sometimes to contain my blog since it is responsive and good enough. Sometimes I cannot access my WordPress admin page so I use this as an alternative to publishing some of my content then just put it on the main site when I have a more stable connection. This system really helped me out to get my ideas out the soonest. I even have my Twitter, Facebook and Instagram set on EngageBay.

What do you dislike about EngageBay All-in-One Suite?
I would not say problematic. But I think it will be very nice if there is a mobile app for this. It can further help me with my content management and creation.

Recommendations to others considering EngageBay All-in-One Suite:
For those of you who are always on the move but needed to have a reliable system that can deal with Internet speed issues. I think this will be very useful. It is a web-based system but really lite to load. Even in situations when I cannot use Facebook or Youtube. at least this system can still load and I can still get some content made. Aside from that this system is really affordable.

What problems is EngageBay All-in-One Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main problem I encounter is having a system that is lite enough for me to use even in remote areas where an Internet connection is weak or rare. This system is able to deal with that well. It greatly helps me with my productivity.

As long as it is feasible, they welcome it.
